```{r, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

load("../../data/corr.rda")
kable(corr, format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed"))
```

If you would like to download the above data, you may do so here: [Download correlogram data](https://github.com/aemabe/brdevs/raw/main/data/corr.rda)
